name: Planet Defense Force
description:
You control a pair of spaceships that are trying to defend a dying planet.

This planet has lost the ability to self-produce oxigen, and the change in the atmosphere is attracting undesired asteroids.

CONTROLS

A/D, d-pad, left stick: Move inner spaceship

, face buttons, right stick: Move outter spaceship

W, LB, LT: Shoot with the inner spaceship

^, RB, RT: Send oxigen to the planet with the outter spaceship
